comments.body: What about the gunzip? The library do the unzip for each chunk? I don't think so, can you test?

Yes. The request module pipe gunzip for each chunk. [see also](https://github.com/request/request/blob/master/request.js#L924). I think that this library is made well.
My Test:
[gziped site](http://checkgzipcompression.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fcheckgzipcompression.com%2F)
Screenshot:
![screenshot-localhost 3000 2016-03-23 07-04-02](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/9736483/13969501/a5295894-f0c6-11e5-8aeb-73a6d368ed8b.png)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +53,57 @@
	stream.on 'end', Meteor.bindEnvironment ->
		buffer = Buffer.concat(chunks)

		callback null, {
